title: Near Premier Shopping, Fine Dining and Lively Enterainment!
posting_body: Our community presents an exceptional array of amenities.
From our community barbecues, multi-media room, resort inspired pool, and pet playground--to expansive ceilings, personal balconies, wood floors and spacious walk-in closets in your home.
Our location says it all: premier shopping, fine dining, and lively entertainment right in your backyard--with Addison Circle nightlife and the city's exceptional Galleria just minutes away.
Each sophisticated apartment home features intuitive floor plans, elegant finishes and state-of-the-art amenities for the ultimate in everyday comforts.
Please call Desiree and mention ad D 230 Dash Apartment Locators
